author: njhargis
description: Gets information about summoners, champions, and matches from League of Legends. Also allows you to bet on the outcome of a match.
install_msg: Thank you for installing LeagueCog. After loading the cog with `[p]load league`, use [p]league setup to walk through setup. Use [p]help league to view commands.
short: Gets information about summoners, champions, and matches from League of Legends.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
